Summary: my freind tells me of a strange ufo she saw the night before that was chased by military aircraft
trends: There has been one other sighting in Orangeville
There were no other sightings in Orangeville on or around October 24th 2010
divs: sighting detailsok so one of my good freinds *(name deleted--cms\sg) was talking to me when we went for a walk onetime she told me that the night before she was walking her dog when a 3 bar shaped craft were flying slowly overhead with flashing lights like a plane suddenly the lights when out on them and came back on the craft were far over to the left a maneuver she thinks a jumbo jet cannot perform suddenly military helicopters showed up and the craft suddenly went super speed and took off with no noise and no after burner the helicopter and the newly arrived jets followed in pursuit she also said she tried to take a video of the craft but when she pointed her phone at them she felt a slight pule and heard a ringing in her ears and the phone died with full battery i dont know what to tell her
